long_description: Train anywhere, anytime with the GoFit Pro Gym Extreme exercise kit. It travels easily and takes the place of bulky weights and expensive workout machines. Includes 5 color-coded resistance tubes, 2 handle grips, 2 ankle straps, 2 door anchors, a laminated training manual and a mesh carry bag. Red tube provides 5 lbs. of resistance, blue tube provides 10 lbs., green tube provides 15 lbs., black tube provides 20 lbs. and the orange tube provides 25 lbs. of resistance. Use different combinations of tubes to obtain 15 levels of resistance from 5 - 75 lbs. Attach the handle grips to the tubes to perform squats, lunges, bicep curls, lat pull downs and other exercises; attach the ankle straps for knee raises, knee tucks and more. Laminated exercise manual is filled with photos and instructions for exercises. GoFit Extreme Pro gym components fit neatly in the mesh carry bag.
short_description: Train anywhere, anytime with the GoFit Pro Gym Extreme exercise kit. It travels easily and takes the place of bulky weights and expensive workout machines.
